name: Jaru's Journey
description:
Jaru's village has been destroyed! A precious artifact has been stolen. Help in her epic adventure to save her village from the council of elders in Jaru's Journey! Heroes from different tribes will need to come together to save their kingdom from the evil council of elders!

Your main tasks are to help Jaru and her friends navigate the land of Izura which has been invaded by monsters from another realm. You'll team up and recruit allies along the way and make new discoveries about the history of the many unique tribes. We've got boomerangs, spears, blow darts and many other special powers.

Jaru's Journey is a fun, 2D platformer, epic adventure game, inspired by African Culture's, Art and Storytelling.

Features:

- Immersive story and narrative

- Immersive Cutscenes

- Diverse worlds and environments to explore

- Various characters and special Powers

- Special Skills and Weapons

- Several Chapters and Stages

- Incredible world building with various creatures and enemies

- Engaging and Challenging Obstacles.

This game is lovingly created in Naija, for the world!
